    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_100723</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mixing of water and ethanol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischen des Wassers und des Äthanols</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mélange de l'eau et de l'éthanol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Misturar da água e do ethanol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Miscelazione dell'acqua e dell'etanolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίξη του ύδατος και της αιθανόλης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El mezclarse del agua y del etanol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the mixing of 50 cubic centimetres of water and 50 cubic centimetres of ethanol resulting to a 96-cubic centimetre mixture.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ethanol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">measuring cylinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Mischen von 50 
Kubikzentimeter Wasser und von 50 Kubikzentimeter Äthanol, 
resultierend zu einer Mischung des Zentimeter 96-cubic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le mélange de 50 
centimètres cubiques de l'eau et de 50 centimètres cubiques 
d'éthanol résultant à un mélange du centimètre 96-cubic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra misturar de 50 
centimetres cúbicos da água e de 50 centimetres cúbicos do ethanol 
resultando a uma mistura do centimetre 96-cubic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la miscelazione di 50
centimetri cubici di acqua e di 50 centimetri cubici di etanolo 
risultando ad una miscela di centimetro 96-cubic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη μίξη 50 κυβικών 
εκατοστόμετρων του ύδατος και 50 κυβικών εκατοστόμετρων της 
αιθανόλης προκύπτων σε ένα 96-κυβικό μίγμα εκατοστόμετρων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra mezclarse de 50 
centímetros cúbicos de agua y de 50 centímetros cúbicos de etanol 
resultando a una mezcla del centímetro 96-cubic.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Äthanol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meßzylinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
